amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General to study and report to Congress on the projected economic impact that the enactment of H.R. 10 will have on financial institutions which have total assets of $100 million or less.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed as amendment No. 7 in House Report 105-531, to require the Comptroller General of the United States to study the projected economic impact that the enactment of H.R. 10 will have on banks and other financial institutions which have total assets of $100 million or less.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 18, 1 Present (Roll No. 148).
